title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and metal threads on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, couching and knot stitches, with applique on plain weave foundation; painted details
description: Central cartouche with Mount Vesuvius and Pompei surrounded by rural scenes and trophies.  This embroidery was from the pattern book of Johann Friedrich Netto Zeichen-Mahler und Stickerbuch, Zweiter Theil, Leipzig 1798.
name: Sampler
